attributes.action: Withdraw from the European Court of Human Rights.
attributes.additional_details: The ECHR binds the hands of parliament, and has been seen to make the United Kingdom less secure as we have seen in the latest Rwanda flight ruling.
attributes.background: Enable the United Kingdom to leave the European Court of Human Rights.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/618456
